title: Tools of the trade: Linux and SQL
description: Gained proficiency in navigating and managing file systems using Linux Commands in the Bash Shell.
Developed skills in using both Graphical User Interfaces (GUI) and Command line interfaces (CLI).

title: Connect and Protect: Networks and Network Security
description: Acquired knowledge about various types of networks and components of networks.

title: Play it Safe: Manage Security Risk
description: Learned about threats, risks and vulnerabilities, and attained knowledge about SIEM tools.

title: Foundation of Cybersecurity
description: Recognized core skills and gained knowledge that is needed to become a cybersecurity analyst.
